Canadian Legal Information Institute

= Introduction =

The [http://www.canlii.org/en/ Canadian Legal Information Institute (CanLII)] is a non-profit organization managed by the Federation of Law Societies of Canada. CanLII's goal is to make Canadian law accessible for free on the Internet.

= Details =

  * The SQL code for the Zotero translator is here: [http://zotero-for-lawyers.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CanLII-translator.sql CanLII-translator.sql].
  * Supported Case fields: "Case Name", "Court" (abbreviated), "Language" and "Date Decided"
  * Above fields are extracted from the page's Meta tags.
  * Currently supports case law only.
  * Doesn't support search URLs.
  * Currently supports English version only.
